title: Your Life in Christ
description: After decades of being overlooked, George MacDonald's powerful nonfiction writings are becoming available to readers hungry to go deeper into their Christian walk. This volume explores topics that comprise the heart of Christian theology, including "The Creation in Christ," "Life," "Self-Denial," "Freedom," and more. In this book drawn from MacDonald's sermons and published essays, Michael Phillips makes MacDonald's wisdom and insights accessible to today's readers.
author: George MacDonald
